title: Ibello Jmeter Tasks
description: Tasks for load and stress testing with Apache Jmeter.

tasks.title: Basic information
tasks.description: Lists basic information of Jmeter test result file.
tasks.name: jmeter.basic

parameters.title: Positive pattern for label
parameters.description: Only keep measures where the label matches this regular expression
parameters.name: jmeter.pattern.keep

parameters.title: Negative pattern for label
parameters.description: Skip measures where the label matches this regular expression
parameters.name: jmeter.pattern.skip

tasks.title: NCR Analysis
tasks.description: Analyzes Jmeter test result file. The file should contain results from multiple measurements. Each of them used the same request multiple times, concurrently. The task groups the concurrent requests and calculates Application Performance Index (APDEX) for them. The Number of Concurrent Requests (NCR) is the base of the analysis. The "NCR - APDEX" and "NCR - response time" relationships are checked.
tasks.name: jmeter.ncr

parameters.title: Satisfaction threshold
parameters.description: Below this response time users are satisfied with the result. Should be in milliseconds
parameters.name: jmeter.threshold.satisfied

parameters.title: Toleration threshold
parameters.description: Above this response time users are frustrated. Should be in milliseconds
parameters.name: jmeter.threshold.tolerated

parameters.title: Positive pattern for label
parameters.description: Only keep measures where the label matches this regular expression
parameters.name: jmeter.pattern.keep

parameters.title: APDEX satisfaction limit
parameters.description: Above this APDEX value users are satisfied with the application
parameters.name: jmeter.apdex.satisfied

parameters.title: Negative pattern for label
parameters.description: Skip measures where the label matches this regular expression
parameters.name: jmeter.pattern.skip

parameters.title: APDEX toleration limit
parameters.description: Below this APDEX value users won't tolerate the application's slowness
parameters.name: jmeter.apdex.tolerated

parameters.title: APDEX function
parameters.description: Type of the fitted APDEX function
parameters.name: jmeter.apdex.function

tasks.title: Function fitting
tasks.description: Fits the selected function to the given CSV dataset.
tasks.name: jmeter.fit
